PRIVATE NEXUS REGISTRY ONLY - No Docker Hub
System Boundary: All services run in Docker containers on single host with platform-net bridge network. External access via mapped ports.
Key Constraint: All container images MUST come from private Nexus registry (localhost:5001) - NO public Docker Hub access.
